rice.description: Rice is the seed of the grass species Oryza sativa.
rice.growing_conditions: Requires warm climate, heavy rainfall, humidity.
rice.nutritional_value: Good source of carbohydrates, provides some protein.

wheat.description: Wheat is a grass widely cultivated for its seed.
wheat.nutritional_value: Rich in carbohydrates, with moderate protein.

maize.description: Maize, also known as corn, is a cereal grain.
maize.growing_conditions: Requires warm weather and plenty of sunshine.
maize.nutritional_value: High in carbohydrates, provides some protein.
